text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: The number of existing primary tumors. In the case of multiple primary tumors in one organ, the tumor with the highest T category should be classified and the multiplicity or the number of tumors should be indicated in parenthesis. If multiple primary tumors are present, this is expressed in an addition to the T category in the form of (m) or a (number), e.g. T2 (m) or T2 (2). In case of one primary tumor, m is omitted from the "IntegratedTNMValue".

purpose.value: This Observation resource represents the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) TNMTumorClassification v4.0 (2024)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/TNMTumorClassification-v4.0(2024EN)).
